dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 02, 2005 1:44 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Sat Apr 02 13:41:13 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DH3Pw-0004Ar-5X        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 31 Mar 2005
11:25:16 -0600
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DH3Pg-000ESh-7z
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 31 Mar 2005 11:25:14 -0600
Received: (qmail 14814 invoked from network); 31 Mar 2005 17:24:59 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 31 Mar 2005 17:24:59 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DH0i4-0001s9-RO        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 31 Mar 2005 08:31:48
-0600
Received: from [67.19.26.66] (helo=sv1.thecatsite.com)        by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse@thecatsite.com)        with
esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1DH0Gc-000Bzo-M8        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 31 Mar 2005 08:03:52 -0600
Received: from igld-83-130-42-159.inter.net.il ([83.130.42.159]
helo=athlon)        by sv1.thecatsite.com with smtp (Exim 4.44)        id
1DGwnZ-00046u-SZ; Thu, 31 Mar 2005 04:21:14 -0600
Message-ID: <015201c535db$6ebeb8b0$0200a8c0@athlon>
From: TheCatSite.com <abuse@thecatsite.com>
To: <akunamatata@maruipol.net>,        <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Thu, 31 Mar 2005 12:21:38 +0200
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed; charset="windows-1255";
reply-type=original
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180
X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse,        please include it
with any abuse report
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - sv1.thecatsite.com
X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com
X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12]
X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - thecatsite.com
X-Source:
X-Source-Args:
X-Source-Dir:
Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 67.19.26.66 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of thecatsite.com) client-ip=67.19.26.66;
envelope-from=abuse@thecatsite.com;
helo=sv1.thecatsite.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2

Dear Sirs,

I wish to report a severe abuse of the website Meowhoo.com, owned and
managed by Mary Anne Miller and Anne Moss (Anat El Hashahar).

Our website Meowhoo.com has been copied in its entirety, including text,
design and content by the owner of  http://www.meowhoocat.hst0.com/.

The person who copied the site changed nothing but the code of the
advertising, so that revenue is generated to them.

Meowhoo.com has been online since September 2002 and endless hours of work
have been put and are still invested in its creation and maintenance. The
copied version on http://www.meowhoocat.hst0.com is at least a few months
old, which leads us to belive that this act of blatant copyright
infringement has been going on for some time now.

DMCA Compliant ISP:
In accordance with the provisions the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of
1998
Please expeditiously "take down" or "block access" to the infringing
material and take appropriate action against the customer to prevent future
abuse.

Non DMCA Compliant ISP:
In accordance with your Acceptable Use Police please expeditiously remove or
block access to the infringing materials and take appropriate action against
the customer to prevent future abuse.
Confirmation of your actions is appreciated so we may appraise out client.
Declaration
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights, said owners being named:
Anne Moss and Mary Anne Miller

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by the above intellectual property owners, their agents, or the
law and therefore infringe their rights.


We also request that you hand us the contact information of the person in
charge of this malicious act of copyright infringement, as we plan to take
legal action against that person/persons.

Mary Anne Miller & Anne Moss




- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCTvYRvK/XpJs6oyURAhfhAJ4q8qDWT1wiBKA3OmzX7IyThFeMfgCghuLO
gCSerHgYnt7yglllAWDCAGc=
=DFUG
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
